name: Bayesian Optimization on a Multimodal Function
description: Optimize parameters to find the global minimum of a multimodal mathematical function. This function features a nearly flat outer region and a sharp central valley, making it particularly challenging for optimization algorithms.
constraint: Parameters must be in [-32.768, 32.768] range. The global minimum is located at the origin (0, 0, ..., 0).

target.name: Function Value
target.description: Minimize the value of the multimodal mathematical function. The global minimum is 0. Typical values range from 0 to ~20.
